post_title: FS: T206 Hal Chase Holding Trophy - Rare Piedmont Factory 42 Back
post_content:
Rare Piedmont Factory 42 back on this Chase with Trophy, one of the ten toughest backs of all T206s.  From the pop reports there are anywhere from 3-6 of these graded by SGC and PSA combined.   Email or PM if interested. 


[url=https://flic.kr/p/2nnF3qL][img]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/52097448620_f24eac2b69_c.jpg[/img][/url]

Jeff,

I am assuming this means you got the one in REA last night. It will fit well in your collection. I fell asleep and woke up to it being closed...UGH !!

Congrats !!

Adam, yes, thanks :)

Now we have to petition REA to begin the lot by lot closings at 11 pm -- on Saturday!

[quote name="calvindog" post=2334451]Adam, yes, thanks :)

Now we have to petition REA to begin the lot by lot closings at 11 pm -- on Saturday![/QUOTE]

Or 9pm for me lol
